LanguageData.NL_FA_Force_No-Cache_Hint: When Conflicting other forced update mods, please disable this feature.
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_Facial_Animation_in_Portrai: If your game is slow, please increase the update interval or disable this feature.
LanguageData.NL_FA_Switch_Left_And_Right_Eyes_Hint: Fix an issue where the left and right eye scars are swapped.
LanguageData.NL_FA_Disable_Eye_Attachment_Hint: Hides textures that cover the FA's eyes.
LanguageData.NL_FA_Draw_the_eyebrows_above_the_hat: Draw the eyebrows above the hat.
LanguageData.NL_FA_Draw_the_eyebrows_above_the_hat_Hi: Draw the eyebrows above the hat.
LanguageData.NL_FA_Core_RaceSettings_Hint: For users who wish to partially disable FA-enabled functions.
LanguageData.NL_FA_Core_RaceSelector_Hint: If disabled, facial animation is no longer applied to the races + xenotype combination.
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_Male_Drawing: Apply Facial Animation's Heads to Males
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_Male_Drawing_Hint: Apply Facial Animation's Heads to Males
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_Female_Drawing: Apply Facial Animation's Heads to Females
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_Female_Drawing_Hint: Apply Facial Animation's Heads to Females
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_Neither_Drawing: Apply Facial Animation's Heads to Non-binary Races
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_Neither_Drawing_Hint: Apply Facial Animation's Heads to Non-binary Races
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_Facial_Animation_For_All_Pa: Enable Facial Animation for All Pawns
If disabled, it stop to apply all animations. significantly reducing computational load. For players who only enjoy changing facial parts.
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_Facial_Animation_For_Non_Co: If disabled, it stop to apply non-colonists's animations. It will reduce the load on the facial animation's load.
LanguageData.NL_FA_Remove_Eye_Hediff_Graphic_Hint: When enabled, nothing will be displayed when blindness, eye sensors or Alcotech eyes are worn.
LanguageData.NL_FA_Ignore_beard_mesh_and_offset_Hint: When enabled, ignore beard mesh size and offset params
LanguageData.NL_FA_Ignore_hair_mesh_Hint: When enabled, ignore hair mesh size params
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_MainTab_Hint: If disabled, the UI on the main tab will be hidden
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_dark_skin_shader: Enable Red Tint Correction for Low-Brightness Skin
LanguageData.NL_FA_Enable_dark_skin_shader_Hint: The vanilla skin shading has an issue where darker skin tones appear reddish. Enabling this option will change the processing of darker skin tones to be the same as Xenohumans. A reload is required.
